amendment.description: Amendment offered as a substitute for the Weldon (FL) amendment (A011) sought to increase funding for the NASA personnel account by $81.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute for the Weldon (FL) amendment to increase funds authorized for the NASA personnel account by $81.5 million.

action.text: Substitute (A013) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX) to the Weldon (FL) amendment (A011).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 271 (Roll no. 202).
